title: Aasimar
excerpt: Mortals infused with celestial power, possessing divine traits like healing touch and transformative revelations.

subEntries.title: Protector Aasimar
subEntries.excerpt: Radiant soul with spectral wings.

subEntries.title: Scourge Aasimar
subEntries.excerpt: Radiant consumption with damaging aura.

subEntries.title: Fallen Aasimar
subEntries.excerpt: Necrotic shroud with frightening presence.

title: Autognome
excerpt: Mechanical beings created by rock gnomes, possessing construct traits.

title: Beastfolk
excerpt: Humanoids with animalistic features, ranging from avian to reptilian to mammalian traits.

subEntries.title: Aarakocra
subEntries.excerpt: Winged people from the Elemental Plane of Air.

subEntries.title: Giff
subEntries.excerpt: Hulking hippo-headed warriors from Wildspace.

subEntries.title: Hadozee
subEntries.excerpt: Simian folk with wing-like membranes for gliding.

subEntries.title: Harengon
subEntries.excerpt: Rabbit-folk from the Feywild with lucky hops.

subEntries.title: Kenku
subEntries.excerpt: Feathered folk with accurate memories and mimicry.

subEntries.title: Leonin
subEntries.excerpt: Noble lion-headed hunters from Theros.

subEntries.title: Lizardfolk
subEntries.excerpt: Ancient reptilian humanoids with practical mindsets.

subEntries.title: Loxodon
subEntries.excerpt: Elephant-headed people known for serenity and memory.

subEntries.title: Minotaur
subEntries.excerpt: Powerful bull-headed warriors with goring horns.

subEntries.title: Tabaxi
subEntries.excerpt: Curious catlike humanoids driven by wanderlust.

subEntries.title: Thri-kreen
subEntries.excerpt: Mantis-like warriors from the deserts and Wildspace.

subEntries.title: Tortle
subEntries.excerpt: Nomadic turtle-folk who carry their homes on their backs.

subEntries.title: Yuan-Ti
subEntries.excerpt: Serpentine folk with innate magical resistance.

title: Bugbear
excerpt: Hulking cousins of goblins with fey gift for lurking.

title: Centaur
excerpt: Fey creatures with upper body of an elf and lower body of a horse.

title: Changeling
excerpt: Fey beings who can supernaturally adopt any face they like.

title: Dragonborn
excerpt: Proud humanoids descended from dragons, commanding elemental breath weapons.

subEntries.excerpt: Base traits for the Dragonborn race.

subEntries.title: Black Dragonborn
subEntries.excerpt: Acidic breath and resistance.

subEntries.title: Blue Dragonborn
subEntries.excerpt: Lightning breath and resistance.

subEntries.title: Brass Dragonborn
subEntries.excerpt: Fire breath and resistance.

subEntries.title: Bronze Dragonborn
subEntries.excerpt: Lightning breath and resistance.

subEntries.title: Copper Dragonborn
subEntries.excerpt: Acidic breath and resistance.

subEntries.title: Gold Dragonborn
subEntries.excerpt: Fire breath and resistance.

subEntries.title: Green Dragonborn
subEntries.excerpt: Poison breath and resistance.

subEntries.title: Red Dragonborn
subEntries.excerpt: Fire breath and resistance.

subEntries.title: Silver Dragonborn
subEntries.excerpt: Cold breath and resistance.

subEntries.title: White Dragonborn
subEntries.excerpt: Cold breath and resistance.

title: Dwarf
excerpt: Stout and resilient folk forged in mountains, known for masterful craftsmanship.

subEntries.title: Dwarf (Race Traits)
subEntries.excerpt: Base traits for the Dwarf race (2024 PHB).

subEntries.title: Hill Dwarf
subEntries.excerpt: Keen senses and deep intuition (2014).

subEntries.title: Mountain Dwarf
subEntries.excerpt: Dwarven armor training (2014).

subEntries.title: Duergar
subEntries.excerpt: Dwarves transformed by centuries in the Underdark.

subEntries.title: Mark of Warding Dwarf
subEntries.excerpt: Protective sigil granting mastery over wards and locks.

title: Eladrin
excerpt: Elves of the Feywild who resonate with the seasons, their mood shifting with nature's cycle.

subEntries.title: Eladrin (Race Traits)
subEntries.excerpt: Base traits for Eladrin.

subEntries.title: Spring Eladrin
subEntries.excerpt: Fey step with charm effect.

subEntries.title: Summer Eladrin
subEntries.excerpt: Fey step with fire damage.

subEntries.title: Autumn Eladrin
subEntries.excerpt: Fey step with calm emotions.

subEntries.title: Winter Eladrin
subEntries.excerpt: Fey step with frightened effect.

title: Elf
excerpt: Magical people of otherworldly grace, known for keen senses and Feywild connection.

subEntries.title: Elf (Race Traits)
subEntries.excerpt: Base traits for the Elf race.

subEntries.title: Drow
subEntries.excerpt: Descended from elves of the Underdark.

subEntries.title: High Elf
subEntries.excerpt: Naturally adept at arcane arts.

subEntries.title: Wood Elf
subEntries.excerpt: Swift, perceptive elves with primal connection.

subEntries.title: Sea Elf
subEntries.excerpt: Aquatic elves with swim speed.

subEntries.title: Shadar-kai
subEntries.excerpt: Elves bound to the Shadowfell and Raven Queen.

subEntries.title: Astral Elf
subEntries.excerpt: Elves who dwell among the stars.

subEntries.title: Pallid Elf
subEntries.excerpt: Pale elves with insight and lunar magic from the Pallid Grove.

subEntries.title: Mark of Shadow Elf
subEntries.excerpt: Shadow sigil granting mastery over illusion and stealth.

title: Fairy
excerpt: Wee folk from the Feywild, infused with its magic.

title: Firbolg
excerpt: Forest-dwelling cousins of giants with obscuring magic.

title: Genasi
excerpt: Tracing ancestry to the genies of the Elemental Planes.

subEntries.excerpt: Base traits for the Genasi race.

subEntries.title: Air Genasi
subEntries.excerpt: Commanding the air.

subEntries.title: Earth Genasi
subEntries.excerpt: Commanding the earth.

subEntries.title: Fire Genasi
subEntries.excerpt: Commanding the flame.

subEntries.title: Water Genasi
subEntries.excerpt: Commanding the waves.

title: Gith
excerpt: Psionic peoples who escaped mind flayer enslavement, now split between two cultures.

subEntries.title: Githyanki
subEntries.excerpt: Psionic warriors from the Astral Plane.

subEntries.title: Githzerai
subEntries.excerpt: Disciplined monks from the chaos of Limbo.

title: Gnome
excerpt: Magical folk known for their cleverness, illusions, and invention.

subEntries.title: Gnome (Race Traits)
subEntries.excerpt: Base traits for the Gnome race (2024 PHB).

subEntries.title: Forest Gnome
subEntries.excerpt: Natural knack for illusion (2014).

subEntries.title: Rock Gnome
subEntries.excerpt: Natural inventiveness and tinkering (2014).

subEntries.title: Deep Gnome
subEntries.excerpt: Natives of the Underdark, suffused with subterranean magic.

subEntries.title: Mark of Scribing Gnome
subEntries.excerpt: Shifting sigil granting mastery over language and communication.

title: Goblinoid
excerpt: Fey-touched peoples including goblins, hobgoblins, and bugbears.

subEntries.title: Goblin
subEntries.excerpt: Expert survivors with fey origins.

subEntries.title: Hobgoblin
subEntries.excerpt: Disciplined warriors with fey heritage.

title: Goliath
excerpt: Distant descendants of giants, towering humanoids with supernatural boons.

subEntries.excerpt: Base traits for the Goliath race.

subEntries.excerpt: Teleportation as a Bonus Action.

subEntries.title: Fire Giant Goliath
subEntries.excerpt: Extra Fire damage on attacks.

subEntries.title: Frost Giant Goliath
subEntries.excerpt: Extra Cold damage and slowing.

subEntries.title: Hill Giant Goliath
subEntries.excerpt: Knock enemies Prone on attacks.

subEntries.title: Stone Giant Goliath
subEntries.excerpt: Reduce incoming damage.

subEntries.title: Storm Giant Goliath
subEntries.excerpt: Reactive Thunder damage.

subEntries.excerpt: Base Half-Elf traits.

subEntries.excerpt: Swim speed from aquatic elf ancestry.

subEntries.excerpt: Drow magic from drow ancestry.

subEntries.title: Half-Elf (High)
subEntries.excerpt: Cantrip from high elf ancestry.

subEntries.title: Half-Elf (Wood)
subEntries.excerpt: Fleet of foot from wood elf ancestry.

subEntries.excerpt: Arcane sigil granting enhanced observation and insight.

subEntries.title: Mark of Storm Half-Elf
subEntries.excerpt: Crackling sigil granting command over wind and weather.

title: Half-Orc
excerpt: Children of different kindreds combining orc resilience with human versatility.

subEntries.excerpt: Base traits for the Half-Orc race.

subEntries.title: Mark of Finding Half-Orc
subEntries.excerpt: Compass sigil granting supernatural tracking abilities.

title: Halfling
excerpt: Small and cheerful, known for remarkable luck and bravery.

subEntries.title: Halfling (Race Traits)
subEntries.excerpt: Base traits for the Halfling race (2024 PHB).

subEntries.title: Lightfoot Halfling
subEntries.excerpt: Naturally stealthy (2014).

subEntries.title: Stout Halfling
subEntries.excerpt: Stout resilience with poison resistance (2014).

subEntries.title: Lotusden Halfling
subEntries.excerpt: Forest halflings with druidic magic from the Lotusden Greenwood.

subEntries.excerpt: Luminous sigil granting restorative healing magic.

subEntries.title: Mark of Hospitality Halfling
subEntries.excerpt: Warm sigil granting hospitality and comfort magic.

title: Human
excerpt: Ambitious and adaptable, known for resourcefulness.

subEntries.title: Human (Race Traits)
subEntries.excerpt: Base traits for the Human race.

subEntries.title: Mark of Handling Human
subEntries.excerpt: Beast-track sigil granting connection with animals.

subEntries.title: Mark of Making Human
subEntries.excerpt: Glowing sigil granting exceptional crafting ability.

subEntries.title: Mark of Passage Human
subEntries.excerpt: Flowing sigil granting supernatural speed and teleportation.

subEntries.title: Mark of Sentinel Human
subEntries.excerpt: Shield sigil granting protective vigilance and defense.

title: Kalashtar
excerpt: Humans bound to spirits from the plane of dreams.

title: Kender
excerpt: Fearless little folk from Krynn.

title: Kobold
excerpt: Small and clever distant kin of dragons.

title: Orc
excerpt: Enduring and determined people of Gruumsh.

title: Plasmoid
excerpt: Amorphous beings who can shape their bodies.

title: Satyr
excerpt: Merry feyfolk with magic resistance.

title: Shifter
excerpt: Weretouched folk who can manifest bestial traits from lycanthropic ancestry.

subEntries.excerpt: Base traits for the Shifter race.

subEntries.excerpt: Extra temp HP and +1 AC while shifting.

subEntries.excerpt: Bonus action bite attack while shifting.

subEntries.excerpt: +10 speed and reactive movement while shifting.

subEntries.title: Wildhunt Shifter
subEntries.excerpt: Advantage on Wisdom checks while shifting.

title: Simic Hybrid
excerpt: Magically enhanced beings with animal adaptations.

excerpt: Linked by blood to the Lower Planes, carrying a fiendish legacy.

subEntries.excerpt: Base traits for the Tiefling race.

subEntries.title: Abyssal Tiefling
subEntries.excerpt: Legacy of the Abyss with poison resistance.

subEntries.title: Chthonic Tiefling
subEntries.excerpt: Legacy of Hades/Gehenna with necrotic resistance.

subEntries.title: Infernal Tiefling
subEntries.excerpt: Legacy of Nine Hells with fire resistance.

title: Triton
excerpt: Guardians of the deep oceans.

title: Vedalken
excerpt: Blue-skinned perfectionists seeking improvement.

title: Verdan
excerpt: Goblinoids transformed by chaotic magic.

title: Warforged
excerpt: Living constructs built for war.
